title: less developed counties use more biomass energy

content.description:
Directions: Select the choice that best fits each statement. The following questions(s) refer to the following sources of energy. 
(A) Photovoltaics 
(B) Geothermal 
(C) Biomass
(D) Hydroelectric 
(E) Hydrogen fuel
content.question: More commonly used in the least developed countries than in highly developed countries

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Describe potential responses or approaches to environmental problems.
